summary: Fitness platform with progressive feature integration including TDEE calculator, exercise videos, PR leaderboard, supplement reminders, recovery guide, transformation gallery, workout log, diet filters, community chat, and affiliate shop

Integrate the TDEE calculator into the client dashboard as a new tab or section, accessible alongside existing features like workout plans and progress tracking
